Description:
Detects RunDLL32.exe spawning explorer.exe as child, which is very uncommon, often observes Gamarue spawning the explorer.exe process in an unusual way

Author: elhoim, CD_ROM_
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: RunDLL32 Spawning Explorer
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((parent_process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and process_path like '%\explorer.exe') and  not parent_command_line like '%\shell32.dll,control_rundll%')
